description.@en: They shall rise again, and again, and again to fight for us!

criticalSuccess.@en: You create Three vials of Reanimation Fluid.

effect.@en:
Create Reanimation Fluid: Depending on where you’re at on the Damage Condition Track, the Difficulty Rating eases or worsens:

Unharmed: (Easy +20%) Alchemy

Hurt: (Routine +10%) Alchemy

Moderately Wounded: (Standard +/-0%) Alchemy

Seriously Wounded: (Challenging -10%) Alchemy

Grievously Wounded: (Hard -20%) Alchemy

Effect: If successful, you create a number of vials for every 6 points of your [IB]. If failed, nothing happens.

[IB] 1 to 6: One vial

[IB] 7 to 12: Two vials

[IB] 13+: Three vials

reagents.@en: You must have access to an alchemical laboratory, aqua vitae and hemlock, and gain 1 Flaw Rank upon completion, regardless of success or failure. Once a vial of Reanimation Fluid is poured onto a corpse, it takes on the stats of a Skeleton from Article 14: Threats. You can only command a number of Skeletons equal to your [WB] at any one time, but you may replace those which have been Slain!. Skeletons cannot be healed.
